verses.verse: Now this is the commandment <S%H4687><s%>, the statutes <S%H2706><s%>, and the ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> to teach <S%H3925><s%> you <S%H6213><s%>, that ye might do them in the land <S%H776><s%> whither ye go <S%H5674><s%> over to possess it <S%H3423><s%>;

that thou mightest fear <S%H3372><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, to keep <S%H8104><s%> all his statutes <S%H2708><s%> and his commandments <S%H4687><s%>, which I command <S%H6680><s%> thee <S%H1121><s%>, thou, and thy son, and thy son <S%H1121><s%>'s son <S%H1121><s%>, all the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy life <S%H2416><s%>; and that thy days <S%H3117><s%> may be prolonged <S%H748><s%>.

Hear <S%H8085><s%> therefore <S%H3478><s%>, O Israel, and observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> it <S%H3190><s%>; that it may be well with thee <S%H7235><s%>, and that ye may increase mightily <S%H3966><s%>, as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of thy fathers <S%H1><s%>, hath promised <S%H1696><s%> unto thee <S%H776><s%>, in a land flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%>, O Israel <S%H3478><s%>: Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> is one <S%H259><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>:
and thou shalt love <S%H157><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> with all thy heart <S%H3824><s%>, and with all thy soul <S%H5315><s%>, and with all thy might <S%H3966><s%>.
And these words <S%H1697><s%>, which I command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>, shall be upon thy heart <S%H3824><s%>;

and thou shalt teach them diligently <S%H8150><s%> unto thy children <S%H1121><s%>, and shalt talk <S%H1696><s%> of them when thou sittest <S%H3427><s%> in thy house <S%H1004><s%>, and when thou walkest <S%H3212><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%>, and when thou liest down <S%H7901><s%>, and when thou risest up <S%H6965><s%>.
And thou shalt bind <S%H7194><s%> them for a sign <S%H226><s%> upon thy hand <S%H3027><s%>, and they shall be for frontlets <S%H2903><s%> between thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>.
And thou shalt write <S%H3789><s%> them upon the door-posts <S%H4201><s%> of thy house <S%H1004><s%>, and upon thy gates <S%H8179><s%>.

And it shall be <S%H3068><s%>, when Jehovah thy God <S%H430><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> thee into the land <S%H776><s%> which he sware <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%>, to Abraham <S%H85><s%>, to Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and to Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> thee <S%H1419><s%>, great and goodly <S%H2896><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>, which thou buildest not <S%H1129><s%>,

and houses <S%H1004><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of all good <S%H2898><s%> things <S%H4390><s%>, which thou filledst not <S%H953><s%>, and cisterns hewn <S%H2672><s%> out <S%H2672><s%>, which thou hewedst not <S%H3754><s%>, vineyards and olive-trees <S%H2132><s%>, which thou plantedst <S%H5193><s%> not <S%H398><s%>, and thou shalt eat and be full <S%H7646><s%>;

then beware <S%H8104><s%> lest thou forget <S%H7911><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, who brought thee forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage <S%H5650><s%>.
Thou shalt fear <S%H3372><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>; and him shalt thou serve <S%H5647><s%>, and shalt swear <S%H7650><s%> by his name <S%H8034><s%>.
Ye shall not go <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, of the gods <S%H430><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> that are round about you <S%H5439><s%>;

for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee is a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God <S%H410><s%>; lest the anger <S%H639><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against thee <S%H8045><s%>, and he destroy thee from off the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>.
Ye shall not tempt <S%H5254><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, as ye tempted <S%H5254><s%> him in Massah <S%H4532><s%>.

Ye shall diligently <S%H8104><s%> keep <S%H8104><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and his testimonies <S%H5713><s%>, and his statutes <S%H2706><s%>, which he hath commanded thee <S%H6680><s%>.

And thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> that which is right <S%H3477><s%> and good <S%H2896><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; that it may be well <S%H3190><s%> with thee <S%H935><s%>, and that thou mayest go in and possess <S%H3423><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%>,
to thrust out <S%H1920><s%> all thine enemies <S%H341><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> thee <S%H3068><s%>, as Jehovah hath spoken <S%H1696><s%>.

When thy son <S%H1121><s%> asketh <S%H7592><s%> thee in time to come <S%H4279><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, What mean the testimonies <S%H5713><s%>, and the statutes <S%H2706><s%>, and the ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> hath commanded you <S%H6680><s%>?

then thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> unto thy son <S%H1121><s%>, We were Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s bondmen <S%H5650><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> brought us out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>;

and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> showed <S%H5414><s%> signs <S%H226><s%> and wonders <S%H4159><s%>, great <S%H1419><s%> and sore <S%H7451><s%>, upon Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, upon Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and upon all his house <S%H1004><s%>, before our eyes <S%H5869><s%>;
and he brought us out <S%H3318><s%> from thence <S%H935><s%>, that he might bring us in, to give <S%H5414><s%> us the land <S%H776><s%> which he sware <S%H7650><s%> unto our fathers <S%H1><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> us to do <S%H6213><s%> all these statutes <S%H2706><s%>, to fear <S%H3372><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, for our good <S%H2896><s%> always <S%H3117><s%>, that he might preserve us alive <S%H2421><s%>, as at this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And it shall be righteousness <S%H6666><s%> unto us <S%H8104><s%>, if we observe to do <S%H6213><s%> all this <S%H2063><s%> commandment <S%H4687><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, as he hath commanded us <S%H6680><s%>.
